```{r data}

HW3Data <- read_csv("~/Desktop/ESM 204 - Econ/HW3Data.csv")

glm<-glm(vote~age+income+NEP+bid+risk, data=HW3Data, family="binomial")
glm
summary(glm)

logit2prob <- function(logit){
  odds <- exp(logit)
  prob <- odds / (1 + odds)
  return(prob)
}

prob.glm<-logit2prob(coef(glm))
prob.glm

summary(prob.glm)

library(tidyverse)
plot(prob.glm)

```
